ResourceHeader.ResourceName: FAST Electrostatic Analyzer (ESA), Electron Burst 0.156 s Data

RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata
Added DOI and PublicationInfo minted by LFB, metadata versioned up to SPASE 2.6.0, reviewed by LFB 20230727

ResourceHeader.Description: The FAST IES and EES measure 32 pitch angle directions simultaneously, 11.25° resolution, and sweep over 48 energy steps in 1/64 of a spacecraft spin. The energy range is nominally 3 eV to 25 keV for ions and 4 eV to 30 keV for electrons, respectively. Each spectrometer consists of two half sensor heads each with 180° by 10° field-of-view, FOV, that are mounted on opposite sides of the spacecraft to form a 360° planar FOV. The out-of-plane response is roughly Gaussian with a full width, half maximum, FWHM, of about 5°. The planar FOV is within the spacecraft spin plane, which is oriented with the spin vector normal to the nominal magnetic field direction. This orientation facilitates continuous pitch angle measurements. Deflectors are used to steer the sensor FOV out of this plane by up to 10° to account for variations of the magnetic field direction during the orbit. In general, the pitch angle distribution always includes both the parallel and Anti-parallel magnetic field directions. Burst data consists of a 32 angle by 48 anergy bin array of counts. Counts are pseudo-log compressed from 16 to 8 bits onboard. The first energy step is a high voltage retrace and should be ignored. Detector anodes rotate by half an anode or 5.625° each sweep. Survey data is averaged burst data that has been despun onboard. Slow survey is averaged into a 32 angle by 48 energy array each half spin or about 2.5 s. Some blurring of the angular resolution results from the half anode rotation on alternate sweeps. Fast survey is averaged into a 64 angle by 48 energy array that maintains the angular resolution. Fast survey time resolution varies from 1/16 to 1/4 of a spin.

Parameter.Name: CDF Epoch
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: CDF Epoch Time, one Element per Ion Distribution
Parameter.Caveats: None This parameter exhibits an increasing monotonic progression.

Parameter.Name: UNIX Time
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: UNIX Time, Elapsed Seconds since 1970-01-01 for each Data Record, without Leap Second Correction, one Element per Distribution, this Time is the Center Time of Data Collection
Parameter.Caveats: None This parameter exhibits an increasing monotonic progression.

Parameter.Name: Interval Start Time, UNIX
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: UNIX Time at the Start of Data Collection
Parameter.Caveats: None This parameter exhibits an increasing monotonic progression.

Parameter.Name: Interval End Time, UNIX
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: UNIX Time at the End of Data Collection
Parameter.Caveats: None This parameter exhibits an increasing monotonic progression.

Parameter.Name: Averaging Time
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Averaging Time, Time End minus Time Start

Parameter.Name: Integration Time
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Integration Time, TIME_DELTA/NENERGY

Parameter.Name: Header
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Packet Header Byte Array

Parameter.Name: Valid Flag
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Validity Flag Code: Bit 0, Non-Zero Values are not necessarily Valid

Parameter.Name: Quality Flag
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Quality Flag

Parameter.Name: Number of Angular Bins
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Number of Angular Bins

Parameter.Name: Number of Energies
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Number of Energies

Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Geometric Factor, used in Calibration

Parameter.Name: Geometric Factor Index
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Geometric Factor Index

Parameter.Name: Bins Index
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Bins Index for the Number of Angular Bins

Parameter.Name: Mode Index
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Mode Index for the Data Mode: 0-2=Survey Data, 0-1=Burst Data

Parameter.Name: Angular Shift, Theta Bin to Pitch Angle
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Angular Shift, converts Theta Bin Values to Pitch Angles

Parameter.Name: Angular Maximum

Parameter.Description: Angular Maximum

Parameter.Description: Angular Minimum

Parameter.Description: Background Counts

Parameter.Description: Spacecraft Potential

Parameter.Name: Burst Electron Raw Counts
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Burst Electron Raw Counts Array with Dimension 96⨯64⨯NUM_DISTS

Parameter.Name: Burst Electron Energy Flux
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Burst Electron Energy Flux Array with Dimension 96⨯64⨯NUM_DISTS, as Plasmagrams

Parameter.Name: Burst Electron Energy Flux, Movie
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Burst Electron Energy Flux Array with Dimension 96⨯64⨯NUM_DISTS, as Plasmagram Movies
Parameter.Caveats: None This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: eflux.

Parameter.Name: Burst Electron Energy Flux, by Energy by Angle
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Burst Electron Energy Flux Array with Dimension 96⨯64⨯NUM_DISTS, as Spectrograms by Energy at Sample Pitch Angle Bin Numbers of varying Pitch Angle
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: eflux.

Parameter.Name: Burst Electron Energy Flux, by Angle by Energy
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Burst Electron Energy Flux Array with Dimension 96⨯64⨯NUM_DISTS, as Spectrograms by Pitch Angle Bin Numbers of varying Pitch Angle at Sample Energies
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: eflux.

Parameter.Name: Median Pitch Angle
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Median Pitch Angle
Parameter.Caveats: None This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ARR_SLICE with the following input parameters: pitch_angle.

Parameter.Name: Median Energy
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Median Energy
Parameter.Caveats: None This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ARR_SLICE with the following input parameters: energy_full.

Parameter.Name: Energy for Full Distribution

Parameter.Description: Energy Values for each Distribution 96⨯64⨯NUM_DISTS

Parameter.Name: Energy Bin Size for Full Distribution

Parameter.Description: Energy Bin Size for each Distribution 96⨯64⨯NUM_DISTS

Parameter.Description: Solid Angle, Domega, for each Distribution 96⨯64⨯NUM_DISTS

Parameter.Description: Orbit Number for this File, does not Change, so only two Entries per File
